channel.title: Thoughts on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Thoughts on Juan Orozco

item.title: Apple iPhone user base on Flickr
item.description: I thought for sure that the 3GS and 4 would have started to take over the 3G's spot as top camera phone on Flickr.  Interesting to see that the 3G actually increased its user base while the younger brothers are either steady or dropping.

item.title: Watched Word Wars last night. I’m amaze…
item.description: Watched Word Wars last night. I'm amazed that they have such a tolerance for drug abuse. It made me think about a point that the documentary Bigger, Faster, Stronger brought up. In order to be competitive in today's competitions, you need to be juiced up on something.

item.title: Post WordCamp RDU Thoughts.
item.description: Yesterday was WordCamp RDU at NCCU's School of Education.  Being my first Camp of any kind, the night before I searched for ideas and tips on what I should prepare for.  The first article I found had three basic points.  The most important to me was something I didn't think of: be prepared with questions for the speaker.  I knew I would get to ask questions, but I didn't think to have them prepared beforehand.  It's the simple things that we miss.
